messages.subject: Does anyone have these? And am I allowed to post this here?
messages.msgSnippet:
Hi,
 I am looking for these items and thought I might find them from someone
on the list but I am not sure I am allowed to post. If I am not supposed
to,
messages.messageBody:
Hi,
I am looking for these items and thought I might find them from someone
on the list but I am not sure I am allowed to post. If I am not supposed
to, please ignore it, delete it and "kindly" tell me.*grin* (some lists
can get pretty blunt.)
I am looking for:
Growing Without Schooling ---back issues

I Hate Mathematics Workbook

Home Education Magazine --back issues

Learning At Home: A Mother's Guide to Homeschooling by Marty Layne

thanks!!!
sharon
